rows.text: Started as Battleborne Entertainment in 2002 and became 3G Studios in 2006. Developer of console, mobile & social games.
Developer, publisher. Merged into Blue Mage Entertainment in 2013.

Invizimals series, Virtual Fighters, Fallen Lords
Publisher, NV Playlogic Entertainment still active

Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku
Creators of many Dragon Ball Z games for Atari. Specializes in Nintendo platforms.
